abstract: The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority, or Finra, Wall Street’s self-regulator, named Bradley Bennett as its enforcement chief.
snippet: The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority, or Finra, Wall Street’s self-regulator, named Bradley Bennett as its enforcement chief.
lead_paragraph: 5:00 p.m. | Updated Bradley Bennett currently defends Wall Street. Now the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority, Wall Street’s self-regulator, has hired him to police the Street. Mr. Bennett will soon become Finra’s new enforcement chief. Mr. Bennett replaces Susan Merrill who left Finra in March.

headline.main: Finra Names Defense Lawyer as Enforcement Chief
